name: Joerg Reichert's Projects
body:
# GitHub hosted projects 
 * [Repository Target Generator](http://joergreichert.github.io/RepositoryTargetGenerator): Editor and Generator for .target and category.xml
 * [Xtext Task Tags Generator Fragment](http://joergreichert.github.io/XtextPlayground/): Support of task tags (like TODO or FIXME) in the comments of your Xtext based DSL
 * [Knapsack problem solver](http://joergreichert.github.io/OperationsResearch/): Solves combinatorial optimization problem - Given a set of items, each with a mass and a value, determine the number of each item to include in a collection so that the total weight is less than or equal to a given limit and the total value is as large as possible.
 * [Opera Mister Wong Bookmarks](http://joergreichert.github.io/OperaMisterWongBookmarks): This project provides Xtext 2.0 based parsers for the [Opera browser](http://www.opera.com/) address file as well as the export format of [Mister Wong](http://www.mister-wong.de/). The goal is, to synchronize bookmark descriptions between my Mister Wong account and my locally used bookmarks in the Opera browser. Another feature is the generation of Wiki mark up out of the bookmark descriptions.
 * [Permet](http://joergreichert.github.io/Permet): Some exercies with Graphiti (and Xtext)
 * [NewTetris](http://joergreichert.github.io/NewTetris): A Tetris game in Java
 * [DirReader](http://joergreichert.github.io/DirReader): Collect the contents of a folder as printable list
 * [DBConnector](http://joergreichert.github.io/DBConnector): read out meta data from DBs and store it as XML

# Google Code hosted projects
 * Contributer to [Spray](http://code.google.com/a/eclipselabs.org/p/spray/): A generator framework for creating domain specific graphical editors.
 * [Git Local Working Sets](http://code.google.com/p/eclipsetestingtools/wiki/GitLocalWorkingSets): Applying a Team Project Set (psf) file for an already locally cloned Git repository without recloning it in the current workspace
 * [JUnit4 Test Suite Generator](http://code.google.com/p/eclipsetestingtools/wiki/JUnit4TestSuiteGenerator): Custom wizard to create a JUnit4 based test suite class by selecting existing test classes 
 * Some small contributions to [DSL Variant Management](http://code.google.com/p/dslvariantmanagement/): Integration of product line engineering (PLE) in your DSL and integration with existing PLE tools

# Sourceforge hosted projects
 * Contributor to [3RAD](http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/dreirad/index.php?title=Main_Page): Wizard based 3 tier JavaEE application generator
 * [Cataquavice](http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/cataquavice/index.php?title=Main_Page): DSLs for expressing service quality used by a generator to produce a WS-agreement file
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
